description: weft-float weave bands with indigo-dyed cotton on native ramie foundation; two indigo bands surrounded and separated by thin grey bands; white bands between; three sides finished, one side cut; bottom indigo bands vary slightly. Woven fabric
markings: Tag, sewn on back at corner: KAJITANI 107
medium: Cotton, ramie; woven fabric with weft floats
title: Shirt Fragment
